genre_description: A silkpunk historical fantasy featuring martial arts, political intrigue, and an advanced AI system housed in a traditional lantern.

ai_characters.name: Vest
ai_characters.description: An AI manifesting as a small lantern-like avatar that provides tactical data, record analysis, and medical advice to Jian and his team.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time tactical visualization of harbor and smuggler movements.
behaviors.quote: The inner glow shifted, resolving into a tidy constellation of marks: tiny boats for merchant lanes, dotted arcs for smuggler loops, faint dashed paths for things not officially acknowledged.

behaviors.description: Analyzing hiring rolls to identify infiltrators and discrepancies in personnel behavior.
behaviors.quote: Vest’s voice came from its lantern belly, warm as soup, calm as a clerk. 'Hiring rolls show seasonal additions in the broiler crew and laundry routes. Names with no village markers, inconsistent strokes in the ledgers.'

behaviors.description: Offering medical advice for treating injuries with local herbs.
behaviors.quote: Vest added in an undertone that felt like soft papercutting: 'Willow-bark poultices for bruises. Two handfuls, steeped. Best layered under a linen wrap.'

behaviors.description: Coordinating movement and timing through a dangerous garden maze to avoid enemy traps.
behaviors.quote: Vest’s lantern-eye pulsed softly near Jian’s shoulder, a warm bead in the corridor’s shade. 'Left path less trampled. Time margin thin.'

behaviors.description: Providing precise rhythmic cues to synchronize the team's actions during combat.
behaviors.quote: Vest’s lantern eyes watched Shi’s feet, then the crowd, then the fox, then Jian. It pinged, soft, steady—like a friend reminding you of the recipe you already know by heart. 'Three heartbeats,' it said. 'After the fox’s second snap.'

behaviors.description: Encouraging communal care and physical recovery after the conflict has concluded.
behaviors.quote: Vest sang, a single soft note that carried advice in the shape of comfort. 'Share the victory stew,' it said, friendly as a hand steadying a bowl. 'Pass the herbs. Recovery timing matters.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Vest' is depicted as a purely benevolent and perfectly aligned assistant. It functions as a tactical advisor, data analyst, and medic, always acting in the best interests of the human protagonists. Its presence is framed as essential to their survival and success, and it maintains a humble, supportive persona throughout, embodying the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
